alert.note: Alert for Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:35PM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR SMITH COUNTY... At 1235 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Raleigh, or 13 miles northeast of Magee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Burns around 1245 PM CDT. Pineville around 1255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sylvarena, Polkville and Mize. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
